alert.note: Alert for White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 10:04AM CST until January 27 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... White River At Clarendon affecting Arkansas and Monroe Counties. White River At Augusta affecting White and Woodruff Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Augusta. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Farm ground along the river in White and Woodruff counties begin to flood. Seasonal agricultural impacts. At 28.0 feet, Roads in Henry Gray Hurricane Lake Wildlife Management area flooded. Thousands of acres of cultivated land flooded in White and Woodruff counties. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 27.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday morning, January 26, and continue falling to 22.6 feet by Thursday, February 03. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 12 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Crest Time Date White River Augusta 26.0 27.7 Mon 9 AM 26.7 25.7 24.9 *FALLING* &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
